Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 205th overall pick, by San Diego in 2004...
Injured on 5/28/2006 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 5/31/2011 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2012, off Blaine Neal (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/2012, off Roman Colon (ARI)...
Injured on 5/26/2014 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/1/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Toronto on 6/12/2020...
Injured on 10/29/2020 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/7/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Injured on 9/21/2022 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
